name: JamJamBubble
description:
Help the bear to create jam by shooting jam bubbles of the same color to earn different kind of jams before the time ends.

This game was made in Unreal Engine for Kindred Games Community Jam #9.

Developed by:

  • Diego Romero: https://majestic511.itch.io
  • Noelia Dorado: https://noeluxii.itch.io
